name: Meld Drone
description: Meld when they take over a biological organism, around the size of a human. The brain is sludged, only the stem remains, they become a peon of the swarm.

abilities.name: Bite
abilities.description: The Meld Drone mindlessly attacks the target with teeth and claw.

name: Meld Drone Swarm
description: A swarm of multiple zombie-like Meld Drones

abilities.name: Devour
abilities.description: The Meld Drones bite and claw at a target with all their multitude limbs and maws.

name: Meld Nanoid
description: Meld in a small, swift form, about the size of a large wolf with lashing tendrils.

abilities.name: Nanoid Tendrils
abilities.description: The nanoid lashes out with it's tendrils

name: Meld Splitter
description: Formless inky darkness, Meld Splitters are around the height of a Mech and made of boundless swarms of coagulated meld.

abilities.name: Splitter Tendrils
abilities.description: Huge tendrils lash out at anything nearby.

abilities.name: Split
abilities.description: When a Meld Splitter is reduced to 0 SP it turns into 2 Meld Nanoids. These act at the start of the next round.

name: Meld Behemoth
description: The apex Meld, the size of a high rise building. Having assimilated vast quantities of mechanical and biological entities, it becomes a force even the toughest of Mechs struggle to reckon with.

abilities.name: Behemoth Tendrils
abilities.description: Long reaching tendrils whip around to grab all within reach, either crushing them or drawing them nearer to be assimilated.

abilities.name: Assimilation
abilities.description: A Meld Behemoth does not infect, instead it absorbs everything it destroys into its mammoth, ever expanding form.

abilities.name: Titanic Actions
abilities.description: The Meld Behemoth can take three Titanic Actions, choosing from the options below. Only one Titanic Action may be chosen at a time and only at the end of another Pilot's or NPC's turn. Meld Behemoth regains spent Titanic Actions at the start of their turn.
options: The Meld Behemoth moves one Range Band.
The Meld Behemoth makes a single Behemoth Tendrils Attack. This does not have the Multi-Attack Trait.
The Meld Behemoth uses the Behemoth Assimilation Ability.
